definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
bamboo or wooden spear/Kangxi radical 79, occurring in 段, 毅, 殺 etc

sentences.english: A fenced area, usually near a stable, used chiefly for grazing horses.
sentences.chinese: 被圍起來的地區，通常靠近牲畜廄，主要用來牧馬。

sentences.english: All the cattle had been moved into stalls and we stood to lose little.
sentences.chinese: 所有的家畜都趕到廄裏，因此我們幾乎不會蒙受損失。

sentences.english: Horse sports are kept in stables inside at most of the year.
sentences.chinese: 運動馬在一年的大部分時間是關在廄內。

sentences.english: He fetched his horse from the stable and called to his hound.
sentences.chinese: 他從廄裏牽出馬來，又喚來了獵狗。

sentences.english: I took it outside and laid it on the lower rail of the corral fence.
sentences.chinese: 我把它拿到外面，擱在牛廄籬笆的下面橫欄上。

sentences.english: Examination of the conscious animal's eyes may be conveniently accomplished in a dark room or stall .
sentences.chinese: 清醒家畜的眼的檢查，可在暗室或廄舍中順利進行。

sentences.english: Then she saw that behind the stall was a beautiful white horse.
sentences.chinese: 後來她在廄欄後面發現了一匹漂亮的白馬。

sentences.english: The horse chafed against his stall.
Don't fall into the mold of applying standard solutions for all problems.
sentences.chinese: 不要陷入老是以標準模式來解決所有問題的巢廄。

definition: to pace back and forth/to hesitate/to waver
aromatic herb used for seasoning/variant of 香[xiang1]
